tasks.label: django:init-project
args:
set -e
if [ ! -d .venv ]; then
  uv venv .venv
fi
STAMP=.venv/.requirements.stamp
if [ -f requirements.txt ]; then
  if [ ! -f "$STAMP" ] || [ requirements.txt -nt "$STAMP" ]; then
    uv pip install -r requirements.txt -p .venv/bin/python
    touch "$STAMP"
  fi
else
  if [ ! -f "$STAMP" ]; then
    uv pip install Django -p .venv/bin/python
    touch "$STAMP"
  fi
fi
if [ ! -f manage.py ]; then
  .venv/bin/python -m django startproject todo01 .
else
  echo "Django project already initialized (manage.py exists)."
fi

tasks.label: django:migrate
args:
set -e
if [ ! -d .venv ]; then
  uv venv .venv
fi
.venv/bin/python manage.py migrate
